spell.morewizardsmod.ancient_soul_summon: Summon a soul that will chase your enemies for you dealing {damage} spell damage on impact
spell.morewizardsmod.discharge.descripti: Discharge a powerful wave of energy that deal {damage} spell damage to all enemy around the caster 3 times
spell.morewizardsmod.discharge.name: Discharge
Summon a slow moving globular lightning that deals {damage} spell damage to everything that hits
spell.morewizardsmod.lightning_strike.de: Strike an enemy target with 3 lightning bolts that deal {damage} spell damage every hit
spell.morewizardsmod.soul_beam.descripti: Channel soul energy to blast your enemies with a powerful beam dealing up to {damage} spell damage every second
spell.morewizardsmod.soul_beam.name: Soul Beam
spell.morewizardsmod.soul_domain.descrip: Summon a group of souls before the caster that will damage everything inside it dealing up to {damage} spell damage every second
spell.morewizardsmod.soul_domain.name: Soul Domain
spell.morewizardsmod.soul_release.descri: Open a small hole between dimension to pour a great amount of soul energy on your targets dealing up to {damage} spell damage every second
spell.morewizardsmod.soul_release.name: Soul Release
spell.morewizardsmod.thunder_summoning.d: Summon 3 powerful lightning bolts from the sky that in a small area deal {damage} spell damage every hit
